    • Uses of SegmentationInterface in images.mining.segmentation

      Classes in images.mining.segmentation that implement SegmentationInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SRMSegmentation
      This class implements the statistical region merging segmentation algorithm and the code is heavily based on an applet created by Frank Nielsen and Richard Nock.
